entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Ivujivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.2°C
entry.summary:

Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Humidity: 87 %

Dewpoint: -13.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
